articles.title: Shane Pow out of jail, appears in Addy Lee and Pornsak's sales livestream - AsiaOne
articles.description: Exactly five weeks after he was sentenced to jail for drink driving, local actor Shane Pow has returned to the camera looking hale and hearty. Last night (Aug 17) at slightly after 9pm, the 29-year-old appeared in a Facebook sales livestream hosted by Mdada, …
articles.content:

articles.title: Duo on same flight who secretly met in hotel room during SHN jailed - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A desire to chat and share snacks while serving stay-home notice (SHN) in a hotel here has earned two travellers a stay behind bars. Bojanki Suresh Naidu, 37, and Bharati Tulshiram Choudhari, 48, were each sentenced to three weeks' jail on Tuesday…
